snippet.title: SURVIVAL ADVANCED - First Trailer
snippet.description:
Welcome to the reef !

Here, you are free to do as you please, but beware... some islands are full of dangers. To protect yourself, explore, build your shelter, equip yourself with weapons, and face your opponents.

In Survival Advanced, you are compelled to inspect each island and survive against enemies to upgrade your camp. Each island is unique in terms of climate, resources, enemies, and other surprises. Moreover, you have the opportunity to embark on this incredible adventure with friends because adventures are always more fun when shared. So, are you ready to take on the challenge and explore these unique islands filled with mysteries and perils?

----------------------

Available exclusively on the Epic Games Store in 2024.

#epicgamesstore
